import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; const Signup = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: '', email: '', password: '', role: 'student', profilePicture: '', contactInfo: '', bio: '', expertise: '', }); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const data = { ...formData, expertise: formData.role === 'instructor' && formData.expertise ? formData.expertise.split(',').map((item) => item.trim()) : [], }; await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/auth/signup', data); navigate('/login', { state: { message: 'Signup successful! Please log in.' } }); } catch (err) { setError(err.response?.data?.message || 'Signup failed. Please try again.'); } }; return (

Sign Up for EduVerse
